title: Public Finance or Public Choice? The Scholastic Political Economy As an Essentialist Synthesis. (arXiv:2306.11049v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: Nowadays, it is thought that there are only two approaches to political economy: public finance and public choice; however, this research aims to introduce a new insight by investigating scholastic sources. We study the relevant classic books from the thirteenth to the seventeenth centuries and reevaluate the scholastic literature by doctrines of public finance and public choice. The findings confirm that the government is the institution for realizing the common good according to scholastic attitude. translated_abstract: 现如今，人们认为政治经济学只有两种方法：公共财政和公共选择；然而，本研究旨在通过研究修辞来源引入新的见解。我们研究了从13世纪到17世纪相关的经典著作，并通过公共财政和公共选择学说重新评估了修辞文献。研究结果确认了政府是实现公共利益的机构，这符合修辞态度。因此，修辞思想家基于其对人类幸福的实质主义态度，看到了政府的共同使命。社会冲突和缺乏社会共识是目的和欲望多样化的产物；因此，如果人类的目的是统一的，则不会存在利益冲突。因此，如果政府按照其指定的任务行事，缺少公众同意并不重要。基于修辞观点，本研究提出了
